git-remote-origin-url

Get the remote origin url of a git repository

Install

sh $ npm install --save git-remote-origin-url

Usage

```js var originUrl = require(‘git-remote-origin-url’);

originUrl(‘path/to/repository’, function (err, url) { console.log(url); //=> git@github.com:sindresorhus/git-remote-origin-url.git }); ```
